title: Neitiznot faceguard

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Neitiznot faceguard is an upgraded helm of Neitiznot that requires 70 Defence and completion of The Fremennik Exiles to wear. In addition to offering increased defensive bonuses, its strength bonus is doubled, giving it the second highest of any helmet behind the torva full helm.

"Faceguard" redirects here. For the head piece of Justiciar armour, see Justiciar faceguard.
Neitiznot faceguard
Released26 September 2019 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID24271

The Neitiznot faceguard is an upgraded helm of Neitiznot that requires 70 Defence and completion of The Fremennik Exiles to wear. In addition to offering increased defensive bonuses, its strength bonus is doubled, giving it the second highest of any helmet behind the torva full helm.

It can be made by combining a helm of Neitiznot and a basilisk jaw after asking Olaf the Bard for stories about basilisk jaws while having it in their inventory.

The helmet is untradeable, but can be freely reverted at any time. If lost in PvP, it will revert to the normal helm of Neitiznot and basilisk jaw.

[[File:Neitiznot faceguard detail.png|left|150px]]
[[File:Neitiznot faceguard chathead.png|left]]
The '''Neitiznot faceguard''' is an upgraded [[helm of Neitiznot]] that requires 70 [[Defence]] and completion of [[The Fremennik Exiles]] to wear. In addition to offering increased defensive bonuses, its [[strength bonus]] is doubled, giving it the second highest of any helmet behind the [[torva full helm]].

It can be made by combining a helm of Neitiznot and a [[basilisk jaw]] after asking [[Olaf the Bard]] for stories about basilisk jaws while having it in their inventory.

The helmet is untradeable, but can be freely reverted at any time. If lost in PvP, it will revert to the normal helm of Neitiznot and basilisk jaw.
